content.text:
# 4th Astra Creative Arts Awards

| last = 3rd
| next = 5th
| network =
| website =
}}
The 4th Astra Creative Arts Awards, presented by the Hollywood Creative Alliance, recognizes technical achievements in films and television of 2025.
Ceremony information
The nominations were announced on November 19, 2025. The ceremony will take place on December 11, 2025.
Winners and nominees
Winners will be listed first and highlighted with boldface.
